monogr.title: A full and plaine declaration of ecclesiasticall discipline owt off the word off God : and off the declininge off the churche off England from the same
monogr.author: Travers, Walter

div.head: Certeine faultes which might stay the reader corrected in this wise / the first numbre signifiethe the page the second the lyne.
